text: Aakhir e kaar har ek ko humne unke gunaah mein pakda. Phir unmein se kisi par humne pathrao (showers of stones) karne wali hawa bheji, aur kisi ko ek zabardast dhamake ne aa liya, aur kisi ko humne zameen mein dhasa diya, aur kisi ko garq (drown) kardiya. Allah unpar zulm karne wala na tha, magar woh khud hi apne upar zulm kar rahey thay
